name: Apple. (Or, A Game About Disgust)
description:
An experiment with new game mechanics and scripts turned into a full-on sci-fi game teaser about eating disorders, body dysmorphia, and shonen anime action. Shout-out to Alexandra Bohannon for story concept.

10-20 minutes of gameplay. 

Content Warnings: 
  • Addiction
  • (Metaphorical) Self Harm
  • Mild cussin' 
  • Body Horror 
  • Wild Tonal Shifts. 
Thank you to: 
  • Alexandra Bohannon, for this incredible concept which I hope I didn’t screw up too badly. 
  • Thalzon, who provides an embarrassment of riches when it comes to art assets.
  • Khas, for his ridiculously cool lighting scripts.
  • HimeWorks, because basic battles are for basic bitches.
  • Yanfly, because sometimes a dude needs to be chased by a bigger, sweatier dude.
  • And YOU, YES YOU THERE. THANK YOU FOR CHECKING OUT MY WORK. YOU ARE GOOD PEOPLE.
